Articles.Content: ^ It's because some textures in the newer B9 (that this pack uses) aren't where the once were. The need to be re-mapped again, PolecatEZ is here again though and I'm sure he'll fix it soon enough.

The original FS pack had Osprey-style VTOL props that could push something pretty big, but the turbo fans that could lift an Avenger carrier haven't been made yet so far as I know.

Actually I'm making a similar lifting fan right now for a flying aircraft carrier mod. My current issue is to make it maintain flight at power as well as save game. The fans are electric and run off a reactor in the carrier.
Bd armory support on the missiles please.
is it just a matter of going into the config file and changing the location or is it something more complex
What's the good word, PolecatEZ? I'm missing my Yari rotors and Gladius engines terribly!

I got a lot of things remade (a few rotors, some cockpits), but then the case of the disappearing Alt-F12 function popped up again.

If anyone has a cure for this, let me know. All other Alt+F# work except Alt-F12, completely locking me out of any kind of testing or reloading function. This brings mod development to a stand still. If seen a few other threads with that issue pop up, but they get closed without an actual resolution.

Do you have the firespitter.dll from the latest B9 release, or the one direct from Snjo?

Snjo's direct DLL made my parts pop into the SPH, but I could not move them, click them, or attach anything to them.

B9's was fine.

I know its not exactly the issue, but I'm just putting it out there.

I'm using the last one packaged with B9.

I just re-stripped my KSP install completely and had Steam rebuild it. Zero mods - still no Alt-F12. I'm going to try a more radical re-installation than just wiping the gamedata folder and see what happens.

If they'd just let you re-map that single function to another key or set of keys, it would be awesome...but no, it has to be complicated.

Hey everyone

Can anyone give me a detailed installation guide.

I kinda screwed up with the installation.

thx

@ PolecatEZ

This may sound really stupid and please forgive me if it sound like I'm teaching you to "suck eggs" but are you sure F12 on is working on your keyboard?

I've just replace mine for this exact reason (too much F12-ing)

Also just to note, I had to totally delete and re-download 0.90 from steam

"Stripping" my 0.25 game down for the updated gave me some headaches.

I hope you get it sorted..

PolecatEZ I Seem To be Having Some Trouble With Your Delicious Looking Mod, Most of the Cockpits and parts in the mod seem to be completely colored in either Dark Grey or a Weird Glossy Black Color. Any Way To Fix This? :/

The file paths are wrong because it uses the B9 textures and B9 file structure was changed therefore creating the problem. If you want a quick and dirty fix you just need to re-point them to the textures in the B9 folder so open the d12 part cfg's and change the texture location to the correct one in B9

Edited February 3, 2015 by Virtualgenius
hum? what .cfg file

If you dont know what the cfg file its best you wait for an update, I see you are quite new it will be the D12 part configs in the B9 folder under expansions D12 wingtech

Edited February 3, 2015 by Virtualgenius

Thanks!

i guess just delete the models or something.

- - - Updated - - -

Thanks!

i guess just delete the models or something.

- - - Updated - - -

PolecatEZ

Umm can you please update this pack for 0.90?

Thanks

any word on update? getting tired of black textures

Edited February 8, 2015 by stali79

It would be nice if you made a version that was Active Texture Management compatible, so people like me who run a ton of other mods don't have to go fishing around in B9 ATM Configs. PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE make a release that has its own textures.

hi polecat!

update pictues please :/ i know your showing off the cockpits but that's only a little of what this mod offers. i would like to see the new stuff like the missle modules and other things. before i download it.
I have a version that works with the current B9 and the most recent FirespitterPlugin, however, I will not post it unless given permission by Polecat.
Did you get the IVA working as well

Did you get the IVA working as well

They were working on the last update.

I have a version that works with the current B9 and the most recent FirespitterPlugin, however, I will not post it unless given permission by Polecat.

D12 is licenced under the same licence as B9 which is CC BY-NC-SA 3.0

Basically since polecat chose that licence permission is automatically granted as long as you follow the license terms.
Looking forward to the compatibility update just found this mod today. Looks amazing

Updated files (I think. There may/will be bugs)

https://www.dropbox.com/s/oqgeugd8uhbg1wl/B9Expansion.zip?dl=0

Open the file, and place the Expansion folder into the B9 folder in GameData.
